title: Bump codecov from 3.5.0 to 3.6.5

nodes.bodyText:
Codecov Report

Merging #10 into master will not change coverage by %.
The diff coverage is n/a.

Legend - Click here to learn more
Δ = absolute <relative> (impact), ø = not affected, ? = missing data
Powered by Codecov. Last update e89e468...e985e6f. Read the comment docs.
Looks like codecov is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.
